detect_language.description: Detect the language used in a text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for language detection.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to detect language for.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, grok-2-latest). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

extract_entities.description: Identify entities (names, places) in text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for named entity recognition.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to extract entities from.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, gemini-1.5-flash, grok-2-latest). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

extract_keywords.description: Identify important terms in a text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for keyword extraction.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to extract keywords from.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4, grok-2-latest). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

generate_text.description: Generate text completions using various AI providers through Eden AI chat endpoint.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text generation.

props.name: prompt
props.description: The main prompt or question you want the AI to respond to.

props.name: system_prompt
props.description: System message to set the behavior and context for the AI assistant (e.g., "You are a helpful coding assistant").

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-3-sonnet-latest, gemini-2.0-flash). Leave empty for provider-specific defaults.

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls randomness (0.0-2.0). Higher values make output more creative.

props.name: max_completion_tokens
props.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.

props.name: reasoning_effort
props.description: Level of reasoning depth for the response.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails.

props.name: include_image
props.description: Include an image in your prompt (for vision-capable models).

props.name: image_url
props.description: URL of the image to include in the prompt (only used if "Include Image" is enabled).

image_generation.description: Create images from text prompts using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, models, and resolutions.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for image generation.

props.name: text
props.description: Description of the desired image(s). Be specific and descriptive for best results.

props.name: resolution
props.description: The image resolution (e.g., 512x512, 1024x1024).

props.name: num_images
props.description: Number of images to generate (1-10).

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use for image generation. Leave empty for provider default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

invoice_parser.description: Extract structured invoice data from files using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and document types.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for financial document parsing.

props.name: file_url
props.description: Public URL to the financial document file (PDF, image, etc).

props.name: document_type
props.description: The type of financial document to parse.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the document. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo). Leave empty for default.

props.name: file_password
props.description: Password for protected PDF files (if applicable).

props.name: convert_to_pdf
props.description: Convert DOC/DOCX files to PDF format for better compatibility.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

moderate_text.description: Detect explicit or policy-violating text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text moderation.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to analyze for explicit or policy-violating content.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., text-moderation-latest, text-moderation-stable). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

ocr_image.description: Extract text from images (OCR) using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and bounding box coordinates.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text extraction.

props.name: file_url
props.description: Public URL to the image or document file.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the text in the image. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: file_password
props.description: Password for protected PDF files (if applicable).

props.name: attributes_as_list
props.description: Return extracted data with each attribute as a list instead of list of objects.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

receipt_parser.description: Extract structured data from receipts and documents using Eden AI. Supports general data extraction with bounding boxes.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for data extraction.

props.name: file_url
props.description: Public URL to the document file (PDF, image, etc).

props.name: file_password
props.description: Password for protected PDF files (if applicable).

props.name: convert_to_pdf
props.description: Convert DOC/DOCX files to PDF format for better compatibility.

props.name: attributes_as_list
props.description: Return extracted data with each attribute as a list instead of list of objects.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

spell_check.description: Identify and correct spelling or grammar errors using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for spell checking and grammar correction.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to check for spelling or grammar errors.

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4, grok-2-latest, command). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

summarize_text.description: Extract key sentences and create summaries from long text passages using various AI providers.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text summarization.

props.name: text
props.description: The text content you want to summarize. Can be articles, documents, or any long-form text.

props.name: output_sentences
props.description: How many sentences should the summary contain (1-20).

props.name: language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" if unsure.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-4o, summarize-xlarge). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

text_to_speech.description: Convert text to spoken audio using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and voice customization.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text-to-speech synthesis.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to convert to speech.

props.name: language
props.description: The language and locale for the speech synthesis (defaults to en-US if not specified).

props.name: option
props.description: Choose the voice gender for speech synthesis (defaults to Female if not specified).

props.name: rate
props.description: Adjust speaking rate (-100 to 100, where 0 is normal speed).

props.name: pitch
props.description: Adjust voice pitch (-100 to 100, where 0 is normal pitch).

props.name: volume
props.description: Adjust audio volume (-100 to 100, where 0 is normal volume).

props.name: audio_format
props.description: The audio format for the generated speech (default: MP3).

props.name: sampling_rate
props.description: Audio sampling rate in Hz (0-200000, 0 for provider default).

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.

translate_text.description: Translate text into different languages using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

props.name: provider
props.description: The AI provider to use for text translation.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to translate.

props.name: source_language
props.description: The language of the input text. Choose "Auto Detection" to automatically detect the language.

props.name: target_language
props.description: The language to translate the text into.

props.name: model
props.description: Specific model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, grok-2-latest). Leave empty for default.

props.name: fallback_providers
props.description: Alternative providers to try if the main provider fails (up to 5).

props.name: show_original_response
props.description: Include the raw provider response in the output for debugging.
